About

Hi, I’m Vibhav Misra, a Data Science master’s student at Pace University in New York City. I’m passionate about building practical machine learning systems and turning complex data into clear, actionable insights.

Before moving to NYC, I completed my bachelor’s degree in Computer Science with a specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

Beyond the classroom, I explore how data and storytelling can intersect, whether that’s through well-designed dashboards, interactive visualizations, or writing about my learning process. I see data science not just as algorithms, but as a way to explain, predict, and engage.
